text: uirksmodeorg about copyrighthtml copyright i dont believe in copyrights for javascript or css solutions
this means my site is largely free of boring copyright notices
you may you may copy tweak rewrite sell or lease any code example on this site with one single exception

you may translate any page you like to any language you like provided â¢	the translation will be available online free of charge â¢	you prominently display a link to the original at the top of your translation â¢	you send me the url when the translation is ready
i will link to your translation from my original page this copyright notice itself does not have a copyright notice feel free to copy it if you like it
seriously i get this question from time to time
you may not you may not copy complete pages or this entire site and put them online on a publicly accessible web space
the only public url of this site is http  wwwquirksmodeorg the usable forms script is copyrighted
it is perhaps the most important script i ever wrote not for what it does but for the way it does it
